reviewText: This movie is hilarious, dvd is a little bit scratched but I enjoyed the movie very much.
Even though this movie is an old one Ive seen older movie with much better quality

I purchased this film because it said it came with English subtitles. When I put it in though, I found it to be poor video quality and it lacked the subtitles. I tried to play it on my laptop and DVD player to see if either would work but it kept saying that the DVD doesn't have English subtitles as an option. I wanted to show it to my boyfriend who doesn't know Spanish and now this purchase has proved to be pointless..

Not pleased.
Great movie for my Vicente Fernandez collection. I use watch all his movies when i was a little gir with my parents.  And now I watch this with my kids.
